titleStmt.title: The late proposal of union among Protestants, review'd and rectifi'd being a vindication of the most reverend father in God, Edwin, Lord Arch-Bishop of York, and the reverend Dr. Tillotson, Dean of Canterbury, from the misprisions of an apocryphal proposer : with a full answer to his proposal, presented to the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Godbid and J. Playford, for R. Clavel ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
NUC attributes this work to Laurence Womock.
